price: 42. “La taga adiga iyo walaalkaa Aayadahayga, hana ka daalina Xuskayga.
arabic: ٱذۡهَبۡ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَٰتِي وَلَا تَنِيَا فِي ذِكۡرِي

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idh'hab anta wa-akhūka biāyātī walā taniyā fī dhik'rī
